welcome.text: In a few steps, you will understand how much you can invest in your home dream ‚Äî simply, practically and realistically.

savings.title: How much have you saved?
savings.helper: Include everything you can use as down payment: savings, FGTS or investments.
savings.subHelper: Every dream starts somewhere ‚Äî this is your starting point.

monthlySaving.title: How much can you save per month?
monthlySaving.text: Think of an amount that fits your budget and that you can maintain until purchase. Consistency builds great achievements.

maxInstallment.title: How much can you pay as a financing installment?
maxInstallment.text: Ideally, installments should not exceed 30% of your monthly income. Choose the maximum amount that would fit comfortably.
maxInstallment.helper: This amount is your monthly comfort limit.

entryPct.title: How much down payment do you want to make?
entryPct.text: The minimum required is 20% of the property value. You can increase it to reduce financing.

monthsToSave.title: How long to save for the down payment?
monthsToSave.text: Choose a timeframe that makes sense for your reality.

feesPct.title: Include purchase fees?
feesPct.text: These costs (ITBI, registry and bank fees) are part of the purchase. The average is 5% of the property value.
